title: President of Haiti
summary: The president of Haiti (French: Président d'Haïti, Haitian Creole: Prezidan peyi Ayiti), officially called the President of the Republic of Haiti (French: Président de la République d'Haïti, Haitian Creole: Prezidan Repiblik Ayiti), is the head of state of Haiti. Executive power in Haiti is divided between the president and the government headed by the prime minister of Haiti.[A133] The current acting president of Haiti is Ariel Henry, who took office on 20 July 2021 following the assassination of Jovenel Moïse.[2][3]
